players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie was killed last night. We should focus on finding the detective quickly. Diana, you’ve been quiet—do you have any thoughts on who seems suspicious?"
You: "I am the detective, and I investigated Bob last night—he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
You: "I trust my investigation; Bob is the mafioso. Diana, please join me in voting him out now so we can protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
